title: Chat with Excel
author: Shivam Patel
description:
Perform question answering  with an Excel or CSV file using Natural Language Query.

This solution uses SQL to query the tabular data in excel and provide natural language response.

installDependencyCommands: pip install streamlit==1.34.0 pandas==2.1.4 numpy==1.26.4 ibm_watson_machine_learning==1.0.356 python-dotenv
